sentences.english: We will increase support for counties and townships with budgetary difficulties and major grain-producing counties.
sentences.chinese: 進一步加大對財政困難縣鄉和產糧大縣的支持力度。

sentences.english: We will increase fiscal support for major grain-producing counties.
sentences.chinese: 我們要加強對產糧大縣的財政扶持。

sentences.english: Improve the incentives for grain-producing counties and increase the size of incentive funds.
sentences.chinese: 完善產糧大縣獎勵政策，增加獎勵資金規模。

sentences.english: The grain region of the Hai River Basin relies on groundwater for 70pc of irrigation.
sentences.chinese: 海河流域的產糧區，地下水佔了灌溉用水的70%。

sentences.english: Improve incentive policy for top grain-producing counties and increase the funds available for rewards.
sentences.chinese: 完善產糧大縣獎勵政策，增加獎勵資金。
